    • calcAgeAtDate

      public static String calcAgeAtDate(Date DOB, Date pointInTime)
      Deprecated.
      This returns the Patients Age string at a point in time. IE. How old the patient will be right now or how old will they be on march.31 of this year.
      Parameters:
      DOB - Demographics Date of birth
      pointInTime - The date you would like to calculate there age at.
      Returns:
      age string ( ie 2 months, 4 years .etc )

      public static Date getDateFromString(String dateStr, String datePattern)
      Deprecated.
      For Parsing Dates.
      Parameters:
      dateStr - The date string to be parsed
      datePattern - The date pattern to use to parse the date string
      Returns:
      Date object. If date was unable to be parsed the object will be null
